data.text:
――Oh man～, I'm really sorry okay? It's got me really 
down too～, ah, how you feelin'? Thoughts on the 
muscle soreness after that Limit Break?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>――Oh man～, I'm really sorry okay? It's got me really 
<story>down too～, ah, how you feelin'? Thoughts on the 
<story>muscle soreness after that Limit Break?

data.text:
After that I ended up trying to use Parallel Running(?) 
with Daitaku Helios…… and it didn't end well for 
me, so I had to take a few days off.

choices.text: I looked over your track record
I looked over your track record

data.processed:
<story>After that I ended up trying to use Parallel Running(?) 
<story>with Daitaku Helios…… and it didn't end well for 
<story>me, so I had to take a few days off.

data.text:
Eh! What's that!? Sounds kinda embarrassing～! Is it that? They 
created a bit of a buzz on UmaTok before, those black disks that 
can play music, right?
data.name: Daitaku Helios

choices.text: No, like results of your mock race
No, like results of your mock race

data.processed:
<story>Eh! What's that!? Sounds kinda embarrassing～! Is it that? They 
<story>created a bit of a buzz on UmaTok before, those black disks that 
<story>can play music, right?

data.text:
That was where I recognized it…… that she wasn't 
weak. Rather, she had magnificent speed and potential―― 
she was someone who could win.
data.processed:
<story>That was where I recognized it…… that she wasn't 
<story>weak. Rather, she had magnificent speed and potential―― 
<story>she was someone who could win.

data.text:
Where'd they upload that? Umasta? Umatter? I want 
to see it too～ actually, I'd rather run it again, 
a mock race! Should we send some invites～?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Where'd they upload that? Umasta? Umatter? I want 
<story>to see it too～ actually, I'd rather run it again, 
<story>a mock race! Should we send some invites～?

data.text: 'kay-check-roger!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed: <story>'kay-check-roger!!

data.text:
Sounds fun! Actually, when I think about it, I've been playing 
too much☆ Forgot I needed a trainer to debut, hilarious!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Sounds fun! Actually, when I think about it, I've been playing 
<story>too much☆ Forgot I needed a trainer to debut, hilarious!

data.text:
……Eh, wait a sec? I think I just noticed something crazy!? 
Trai-pi…… is short for trainer, right? Aren't you a trainer!?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>……Eh, wait a sec? I think I just noticed something crazy!? 
<story>Trai-pi…… is short for trainer, right? Aren't you a trainer!?

data.text:
Whaddaya know～. Then Trai-pi just needs to be my trainer☆ We're 
already best buds♪ And it's not like you hate me, right～?
data.name: Daitaku Helios

choices.text: But you haven't chosen me yet
But you haven't chosen me yet

data.processed:
<story>Whaddaya know～. Then Trai-pi just needs to be my trainer☆ We're 
<story>already best buds♪ And it's not like you hate me, right～?

data.text: Eh?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed: <story>Eh?

data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed: <story>……！

data.text:
Sorry, what's that mean? Huh?? Da heck? 
It needs more than a contract? Is it a state of mind??
data.name: Daitaku Helios

choices.text: Right. If I can make it more fun……
Right. If I can make it more fun……

data.processed:
<story>Sorry, what's that mean? Huh?? Da heck? 
<story>It needs more than a contract? Is it a state of mind??

data.text:
I need to show her that running with me is the 
way to fulfill her dream. If I can show her that 
it'll be a "never-ending festival" then――
data.processed:
<story>I need to show her that running with me is the 
<story>way to fulfill her dream. If I can show her that 
<story>it'll be a "never-ending festival" then――

data.text:
……Hmm, got it. Orrrr, maybe I don't? As long as it's fun, 
I don't mind either way! Right, lookin' forward to it～☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>……Hmm, got it. Orrrr, maybe I don't? As long as it's fun, 
<story>I don't mind either way! Right, lookin' forward to it～☆

data.text:
And so, in preparation for the next Selection Race, 
I watched over Daitaku Helios' training. And then――
data.processed:
<story>And so, in preparation for the next Selection Race, 
<story>I watched over Daitaku Helios' training. And then――

data.text:
――Oooooh～! Things are startin' to heat up―☆! 
Everyone's on fire! Crazy awesome!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>――Oooooh～! Things are startin' to heat up―☆! 
<story>Everyone's on fire! Crazy awesome!

data.text:
Looks like Daitaku Helios has an instructor now. 
But that trainer…… can they properly keep her under control?
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Looks like Daitaku Helios has an instructor now. 
<story>But that trainer…… can they properly keep her under control?

data.text:
It's over as soon as she goes wild. That girl 
will just end up doing whatever is fun at the 
time…… I don't think she can race seriously.
data.name: Rookie Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>It's over as soon as she goes wild. That girl 
<story>will just end up doing whatever is fun at the 
<story>time…… I don't think she can race seriously.

data.text:
Wei, yeah! 
"DJ Helios goes Boom boom boom!" right☆?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Wei, yeah! 
<story>"DJ Helios goes Boom boom boom!" right☆?

data.text:
―Don't laugh until you're at the peak!? 
What does that even mean～～!?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>―Don't laugh until you're at the peak!? 
<story>What does that even mean～～!?

data.text:
Until now, she's run while only focused on the fun in the moment. 
You can't really call that a "Race".

choices.text: You need to hold back until then
You need to hold back until then

data.processed:
<story>Until now, she's run while only focused on the fun in the moment. 
<story>You can't really call that a "Race".

data.text:
Impossible! 'Cuz it's all super fun! 
Let's not do the whole holding back thing, no way no way no way!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Impossible! 'Cuz it's all super fun! 
<story>Let's not do the whole holding back thing, no way no way no way!

data.text: Eh?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed: <story>Eh?

data.text:
『Oh! It's here, it's here～～!! 
I really like this song!! Let's dance!』
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>『Oh! It's here, it's here～～!! 
<story>I really like this song!! Let's dance!』

data.text:
The DJ was gauging the mood on the floor. They 
would gradually increase the tempo in reaction 
to the crowd's excitement to maximize it――
data.processed:
<story>The DJ was gauging the mood on the floor. They 
<story>would gradually increase the tempo in reaction 
<story>to the crowd's excitement to maximize it――

data.text:
――Almost like they were creating a "wave". Rather than using only 
one tone, they chose to fuse and mix several, creating a swirl 
and surge. That kind of "fun".
data.processed:
<story>――Almost like they were creating a "wave". Rather than using only 
<story>one tone, they chose to fuse and mix several, creating a swirl 
<story>and surge. That kind of "fun".

data.text:
Races were the same. If she runs well, her opponents will follow 
suit. That, in itself, should make the race more exciting for her.

choices.text: The Peak…… catch the biggest wave!

data.processed:
<story>Races were the same. If she runs well, her opponents will follow 
<story>suit. That, in itself, should make the race more exciting for her.

data.text:
……!!!! 
A big wave…… count me in!!!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>……!!!! 
<story>A big wave…… count me in!!!!

data.text:
……! Catch a wave! I'll do it! 
Seriously, I won't laugh!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>……! Catch a wave! I'll do it! 
<story>Seriously, I won't laugh!!

data.text:
――Scope out the floor, match the tempo, and read the mood! 
So I can make it more fun!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>――Scope out the floor, match the tempo, and read the mood! 
<story>So I can make it more fun!!

data.text:
Alright, then for that first-class thrill! 
Blitz Captain Helios, sallies forth!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Alright, then for that first-class thrill! 
<story>Blitz Captain Helios, sallies forth!!

data.text: ――Uraaaaaaaaaaah!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed: <story>――Uraaaaaaaaaaah!!

data.text:
Uwah, there goes Helios! 
If that girl is here, then this race is gonna be wild!
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>Uwah, there goes Helios! 
<story>If that girl is here, then this race is gonna be wild!

data.text:
She'll just wear herself out eventually. 
So the ones I need to worry about are――
data.name: Uma Musume B
data.processed:
<story>She'll just wear herself out eventually. 
<story>So the ones I need to worry about are――

data.text:
(Ahー, they're falling back? 
I see, I see, so the beat is slow, huh? Got it!)
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>(Ahー, they're falling back? 
<story>I see, I see, so the beat is slow, huh? Got it!)

data.text:
Daitaku Helios was focused. And the others don't seem 
to have realized that "she's racing" yet……
data.processed:
<story>Daitaku Helios was focused. And the others don't seem 
<story>to have realized that "she's racing" yet……

data.text:
Alright, it's about time I make a move……! 
Huh, wha-what's going on!?
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>Alright, it's about time I make a move……! 
<story>Huh, wha-what's going on!?

data.text:
Helios' pace isn't dropping at all!? 
……Eh, wait, wait, eh, no way……!?
data.name: Uma Musume B
data.processed:
<story>Helios' pace isn't dropping at all!? 
<story>……Eh, wait, wait, eh, no way……!?

data.text:
(It's here, it's here, it's here!! 
This is it! The big waveーーーー! Then……!)
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>(It's here, it's here, it's here!! 
<story>This is it! The big waveーーーー! Then……!)

data.text:
I just need to catch it～～～～! 
Uwahahahahahaaaa!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>I just need to catch it～～～～! 
<story>Uwahahahahahaaaa!!

data.text: Eeeeeeeeh～～～～!?
data.name: Everyone
data.processed: <story>Eeeeeeeeh～～～～!?

data.text:
(Wild, I made a super huge wave!? 
Kuuuu～～～～, crazy, fun to the MAX～～～～!!)
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>(Wild, I made a super huge wave!? 
<story>Kuuuu～～～～, crazy, fun to the MAX～～～～!!)

data.text:
『If I can make it more fun…… 
then make me your trainer』
data.processed:
<story>『If I can make it more fun…… 
<story>then make me your trainer』

data.text:
『If I can make it more fun…… 
then make me your trainer』
data.processed:
<story>『If I can make it more fun…… 
<story>then make me your trainer』

data.text:
(Hahaa…… this is what they meant, huh! Yeah, yeah yeah yeah! 
Wait, if this is what's on deck…… then wouldn't hangin' with 
Trai-pi be the best!?)
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>(Hahaa…… this is what they meant, huh! Yeah, yeah yeah yeah! 
<story>Wait, if this is what's on deck…… then wouldn't hangin' with 
<story>Trai-pi be the best!?)

data.text:
――And then…… it really would be a never-ending festival!! 
Uraaaaaaaaaaaa!!!!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>――And then…… it really would be a never-ending festival!! 
<story>Uraaaaaaaaaaaa!!!!!

data.text:
――First place～～～!! Hell yeah☆ 
Awesome! Crazy! Seriously lit! Trai-pi we～i!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>――First place～～～!! Hell yeah☆ 
<story>Awesome! Crazy! Seriously lit! Trai-pi we～i!!

data.text:
Got that right☆ Then, up next for me and Trai-pi! 
Can't be anything but the Twinkle Series, right!?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Got that right☆ Then, up next for me and Trai-pi! 
<story>Can't be anything but the Twinkle Series, right!?

data.text:
Seriously, lookin' forward to it, Trainer☆ 
Ah, still need my seal? Photo ID, okay?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Seriously, lookin' forward to it, Trainer☆ 
<story>Ah, still need my seal? Photo ID, okay?

data.text:
And so…… I formed a trainer contract with Daitaku Helios, 
a bright, lively, fun―loving―― party Uma Musume.
data.processed:
<story>And so…… I formed a trainer contract with Daitaku Helios, 
<story>a bright, lively, fun―loving―― party Uma Musume.

data.text:
――Right, on to today's training, let's move it☆ 
Move it☆ Move it move it☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>――Right, on to today's training, let's move it☆ 
<story>Move it☆ Move it move it☆

data.text:
We～i! Who's it today? A shadow? A local? Wei? 
A rough-houser? Whoever it is, come on――
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>We～i! Who's it today? A shadow? A local? Wei? 
<story>A rough-houser? Whoever it is, come on――

data.text:
――……Nice to meet you, my name is Daiichi Ruby. 
I look forward to working with you today.
data.name: Daiichi Ruby
data.processed:
<story>――……Nice to meet you, my name is Daiichi Ruby. 
<story>I look forward to working with you today.

data.text: I can't.
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed: <story>I can't.

data.text: ……excuse me?
data.name: Daiichi Ruby
data.processed: <story>……excuse me?

data.text: Luv.
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed: <story>Luv.

data.text:
Love! Je t'aime! Toooo～～tally my type!! 
Would you be my number one main squeeze!?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Love! Je t'aime! Toooo～～tally my type!! 
<story>Would you be my number one main squeeze!?

data.text: Eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeh!?
data.name: Uma Musume
data.processed: <story>Eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeh!?
